nodes.text: Padawan Manual is a book which features questions and puzzles about the Star Wars universe. It was published by Hachette Heroes on November 10, 2016.

Entra en el Templo Jedi y emprende el recorrido iniciático para convertirte en un verdadero Maestro de esta orden emblemática. Resuelve enigmas, responde preguntas e identifica los distintos tipos de uniformes, naves y muchas cosas más. Con las 100 pruebas de este manual podrás agudizar tus sentidos, reconocer planetas y a sus pobladores, explorar el universo y, finalmente, completar tu adiestramiento como Jedi.

(Translation: Enter the Jedi Temple and embark on the initiatory journey to become a true Master of this emblematic order. Solve puzzles, answer questions, and identify different types of uniforms, ships, and much more. With the 100 tests in this manual you will be able to sharpen your senses, recognize planets and their inhabitants, explore the universe and, finally, complete your training as a Jedi.)
